long_description: Designed for weekend backpacking trips, the REI Flash 45 Pack provides an impressive level of carrying comfort for a pack this light-it's just over 2 pounds. Activflex LT perimeter frame combines tubular aluminum with flexible Delrin(R) side rods to allow torso rotation, yet efficiently transfer the load to the hipbelt. Freeflow LT back conforms to your back and has ventilation channels and a central breezeway to keep you cool. Streamlined shape fits close to the body for stability; over-the-top compression strap snugs loads close. Stretch front stash pocket accommodates bulky gear; mesh side pockets are perfect for water bottles. Tip grips are paired with speed hooks to securely hold trekking poles; pack also has multiple lash loops. Hydration-compatible design accepts most popular types of reservoirs (sold separately); you can route the sip tube over either shoulder. Stretch-mesh shoulder-strap pocket fits a camera. The REI Flash 45 Pack also includes handy hipbelt pockets where you can stash small trail essentials.
